channel.title: Funny IRC chats
channel.description:
Post yours here.
Apoc on pain meds is hilarious.
[code][00:59] <Apoc> holy fuck [00:59] <Apoc> a fucking spider [00:59] <Apoc> on my monitor [00:59] <Apoc> wtf do i do [00:59] <Apoc> it's an ultimatum [00:59] <Apoc> he [00:59] <Apoc> he knows [01:00] <Apoc> if I hit him [01:00] <Apoc> I'll break the monitor [01:00] <Apoc> but if I don't [01:00] <Apoc> then I'm scared [01:00] <Apoc> touche mr spider touche[/code]

item.title: Funny IRC chats
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

<jme_009> hold me hold me, i wanna get higher and higher..
<Fat_Cookies> interia?
<bootnecklad> yeah
<smacktard> thug-life, possible yeah but 19100 isnt 2000
<Fat_Cookies> i agree
<Thug-life> Dude HighLight Me Again smacktard And Ill Smack You
<smacktard> dude he made fr33sc4p3
<Davidude> smacktard, you so smart
<Thug-life> lool
<smacktard> what the_soul when did u get smart again
<Davidude> hahaha
<Thug-life> hah
<Thug-life> win bot

2 people get ownt by bot.

ps, the exact same topic has been posted over 9000 times.
